SQL.LOAD: SELECT report_type, ftp_filename, report_parameters, status, start_date, end_date, error_message, user_email_address, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, report_proc, sourceurl, report_request_id FROM elp_report_requests WHERE report_request_id = :report_request_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_report_requests SET report_type = :report_type, ftp_filename = :ftp_filename, report_parameters = :report_parameters, status = :status, start_date = :start_date, end_date = :end_date, error_message = :error_message, user_email_address = :user_email_address, report_proc = :report_proc, sourceurl = :sourceurl, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE report_request_id = :report_request_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_report_requests ( report_type, ftp_filename, report_parameters, status, start_date, end_date, error_message, user_email_address, report_proc, sourceurl, created_by, report_request_id ) VALUES ( :report_type, :ftp_filename, :report_parameters, :status, :start_date, :end_date, :error_message, :user_email_address, :report_proc, :sourceurl, :created_by, :report_request_id )
SQL.GET_ACCESS_COUNT_BY_USER: SELECT count(*) access_count FROM ELP_REPORT_REQUESTS r WHERE r.created_by = :created_by
SQL.REPORTS_BY_USER: SELECT DISTINCT REPORT_TYPE FROM ELP_REPORT_REQUESTS r WHERE r.created_by = :created_by
SQL.LOAD_REQUESTS_BY_USER: SELECT report_type, ftp_filename, report_parameters, status, start_date, end_date, error_message, user_email_address, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, report_proc, sourceurl, report_request_id FROM elp_report_requests r WHERE r.created_by = :created_by and r.report_type = :report_type
SQL.LOAD_REQUESTS_BY_REPORT_KEY: SELECT report_type, ftp_filename, report_parameters, status, start_date, end_date, error_message, user_email_address, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, report_proc, sourceurl, report_request_id FROM elp_report_requests r WHERE r.created_by = :created_by and r.report_request_id = :report_request_id
SQL.LOAD_REQUESTS: SELECT report_type, ftp_filename, report_parameters, status, start_date, end_date, error_message, user_email_address, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, report_proc, sourceurl, report_request_id FROM elp_report_requests r WHERE r.report_request_id = :report_request_id and r.created_by = :created_by
